name: Bananalicious
description:
You are a banana trying to survive 10 waves of craziness.

You are hungry, so use your weapon(Fires tomatos) to knock down your enemies so you can eat them.

Enemies:

  • Tomatos (Gives 40 points when ate. Gives 20 points when knocked down)
  • Bananas (Gives 30 points when ate. Gives 10 points when knocked down)

How to play:

  • Eat knocked down enemies to get health and to reduce hunger.
  • Survive 10 waves to win.

Controls:

  • F - Eat knocked down enemies
  • W or Space - Jump | Hold to jump higher
  • AD - Move left or right
  • Left Mouse Button - Fire tomatos
  • P - Pause game

You can submit scores (locally), so you can try and beat your own score or a friend's.

You can also take a screenshot of your scores and post them, and then other people can try and beat yours :-)
